statements: SELECT * FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Credit' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM financial_transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'Credit' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) AS num_transactions FROM financial_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_transactions > 5;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM financial_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 5000 AND transaction_type = 'Debit' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amount, MIN(transaction_amount) AS min_transaction_amount FROM financial_transactions;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT MAX(balance_amount) AS max_balance FROM account_balances;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(balance_amount) AS total_balance FROM account_balances GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customer_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, MAX(transaction_amount) AS max_transaction_amt FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING max_transaction_amt > 1000 ORDER BY max_transaction_amt ASC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(balance_amount) AS avg_balance FROM account_balances GROUP BY customer_id HAVING avg_balance < 5000 ORDER BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT customer_id, amount FROM transactions
SELECT customer_name, account_number FROM customers
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_name, account_number, balance FROM customers c JOIN accounts a ON c.account_number = a.account_number
SELECT customer_name, MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM customers c JOIN accounts a ON c.account_number = a.account_number GROUP BY customer_name HAVING MAX(balance) > 5000
SELECT * FROM transactions t JOIN customers c ON t.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE c.customer_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT accounts.account_id, accounts.balance, customers.customer_name FROM accounts JOIN customers ON accounts.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, employee_role FROM employees WHERE employee_role = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT account_id, balance FROM accounts WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT deposit_id, deposit_date FROM deposits WHERE account_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT account_type, balance FROM accounts WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance ASC;
SELECT transaction_type, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount < 0 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM deposits JOIN accounts ON deposits.account_id = accounts.account_id WHERE deposit_date >= '2021-01-01';
